Grant Proposal: Chattanooga Hockey

Introduction:
Chattanooga Hockey is a community-based inline hockey league that provides opportunities for both youth and adult players to develop their skills, engage in healthy competition, and foster a love of the sport. Our league is dedicated to promoting sportsmanship, character development, and community involvement, while ensuring a safe and enjoyable playing experience for all participants.

Purpose:
The purpose of this grant proposal is to secure funding for the ongoing operations and growth of Chattanooga Hockey. Our goal is to provide the necessary resources to support our players, including equipment, training, and facilities, and to promote the sport of inline hockey in the greater Chattanooga area.

Program Description:
Chattanooga Hockey offers adult (age 16+) and youth divisions for players aged 5-9 (U9) and 10-15 (U15). Our program is designed to accommodate players of all skill levels, from beginner to advanced, and to provide opportunities for continued growth and development.

Our league operates under a set of principles that emphasize safety, fair play, and the importance of having fun. We work closely with our players, parents, and coaches to promote a positive, supportive environment, where all participants can grow and thrive.

Financial Needs:
Chattanooga Hockey relies on the support of our community to continue our program. Our primary needs include funding for equipment, training, facilities, and administrative expenses. With the support of this grant, we will be able to further our mission to encourage participation, develop character, advocate sportsmanship, and promote community engagement in inline hockey.

Budget:

* Equipment: $2,000
* Training: $1,500
* Facilities: $3,000
* Administrative Expenses: $1,500

Total Budget: $8,000

Conclusion:
Chattanooga Hockey is a vibrant and growing inline hockey league that is dedicated to providing opportunities for players of all ages to experience the joy of hockey and to develop their skills and character. With the support of this grant, we will be able to continue our mission and ensure that the sport of inline hockey remains accessible and enjoyable for all members of our community.

Thank you for your consideration of this grant proposal. We look forward to the opportunity to continue to serve the Chattanooga area and to provide a safe and enjoyable environment for all players.
